## IGraphicsComponentSpecification.onBeforeUpdate() method

Invariant by entity for a given frame, called either once or entity count times before update, depending on update strategy.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
onBeforeUpdate(entityRenderer: TEntityRenderer, updateArg: TUpdateArg): void;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  entityRenderer | TEntityRenderer |  |
|  updateArg | TUpdateArg |  |

void
